name: Organ Farms
desc: Artificial growth of organs is a slow and fickle process without Domain-era technology. Typically achieved by leveraging medical equipment to regenerate a piece of an existing organ, then dividing it into multiple fragments and repeat the process. The process is extremely oxygen and water hungry, and can only be reasonably sustained on habitable worlds.

name: Biotech Facility
desc: The design schematics from Exodyne have been replicated as closely as possible with the Sector's current technology. While the result is not flawless, the resulting megacomplex is still capable of incredible feats of bioengineering. Vast quantities of sugars, organic slurry, and oxygen are constantly refined and grown into organs and other biological products.

name: Vulpoid Distribution Agency
desc: Regulations, grants, and infrastructure to support the trade and distribution of Vulpoids to and within a colony that lacks local production. Local Vulpoid burrows and training facilities also increase the capacity of local workforces.
